pages.text: This upgrade only affects the $(l:modules/fluid)Fluid Module Mk1/$ and $(l:modules/fluid_2)Fluid Module Mk2/$.$(p)It increases the overall fluid transfer rate of the $(l:router/modular_router)Router/$ (in each direction; in & out of the router) from the base rate of 50mB/tick by 10mB/tick, up to a maximum of 400mB/tick. Therefore the maximum number of Fluid Transfer Upgrades in a router is 35.
